meanings.definition: Having more lips or a larger mouth than usual.
meanings.sent1: The frog with the lippier mouth caught more flies.
meanings.sent2: Her lippier smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The lippier goldfish seemed to pout at the other fish.
meanings.sent4: The lippier door of the house welcomed guests with a wide grin.
meanings.sent5: The lippier pumpkin in the patch stood out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to talk back or be sassy.
meanings.sent1: The lippier student always had a quick response in class.
meanings.sent2: Her lippier attitude got her in trouble with the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The lippier parrot had a witty comeback for everything.
meanings.sent4: The lippier cat sauntered away with a flick of its tail.
meanings.sent5: The lippier child's retorts kept everyone entertained during dinner.
